Package: org.ajoberstar.grgit.operation

[Groovy] Class AddOp

    • org.ajoberstar.grgit.operation.AddOp
    • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
      java.util.concurrent.Callable

      class AddOp
extends java.lang.Object

      Adds files to the index.

      To add specific files or directories to the path. Wildcards are not supported. 

       grgit.add(patterns: ['1.txt', 'some/dir'])

      To add changes to all currently tracked files.

       grgit.add(update: true)
      See git-add Manual Page.
      See Also:
      git-add Manual Page
      Since:
      0.1.0

      • Properties Summary

          Properties 
          Type Name and description
          java.util.Set<java.lang.String>  patterns
          Patterns of files to add to the index.
          boolean  update
          true if changes to all currently tracked files should be added to the index, false otherwise.
